pkgmetadata.longdescription: Output Space-Filling Design // A method to generate a design in the input space that sequentially fills the output space of a black-box function. The output space-filling design will be helpful in inverse design or feature-based modeling problem. Please see Wang et al.(2023) DOI:10.48550/arXiv.2305.07202 for details. This work is supported by U.S. National Foundation grant CMMI-1921646.
